metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32439 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Buffer overflow in the stbl_AppendSize function in MP4Box in GPAC 1.0.1 allows attackers to cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
